Pirates manager Derek Shelton endorsed Skenes for the National League Rookie of the Year, citing his historic performance.
Pirates manager Derek Shelton praised Paul Skenes, saying 'He's special. He continues to evolve. I mean the change-up today was elite.'

Reds manager David Bell commented on Skenes' performance, stating 'He dominated really. He had a really good change-up. It is kind of the growth from the last time we faced him. That pitch was a difference maker for him today.'
Reds manager David Bell noted that Skenes' changeup was a difference maker in the game.
Derek Shelton commended Skenes for his historic performance and evolving skills.
Paul Skenes expressed that winning the Rookie of the Year award would be a cool honor, especially in his first professional season.

Paul Skenes reflected on his performance, saying 'Obviously, the third time seeing them, you gotta get them out in different ways than you have in the past. We did a good job adjusting to that today.'
Joey Bart praised Skenes' performance and his ability to put zeros on the board.
Paul Skenes expressed that winning Rookie of the Year would be a cool honor.
Nick Yorke reflected on his journey to the big leagues and his excitement to contribute to the team.
